Articles.Content:
TSG, can you risk cranking up some of your GFX settings? I'm interested to see if it's to do with terrain rendering. It's almost like our terrains aren't the same, which is really strange.

Setting the terrain detail to the highest setting fixed it, you'll probably wanna put that in the OP.

Okay, confirmed it's terrain rendering. I work with it on high. In future I'll work with it on default. Fixed next version.

EDIT - Ninja'd!

... ... Jesus moving cars... amazing ... spechless

Someone needs to show this to scott manely for his intersellar quest!

Edited June 30, 2014 by montyben101

... ... Jesus moving cars... amazing ... spechless

Someone needs to show this to scott manely for his intersellar quest!

Credit where credit is due. The animated stuff is by Lack, from KSC++. I've not started on animations with my parts yet.

This is so cool! just launched an X37 from the old KSC !!

One thing: could you put some sort of runway/launch site on the large continent in the centre of the map?

This is so cool! just launched an X37 from the old KSC !!

One thing: could you put some sort of runway/launch site on the large continent in the centre of the map?

Large continent in the centre?

That sounds like where KSC2 is located. If so, that's requested and on the list.

No i mean the other one

my amazing MS paint skills:
Many bases planned for that area yep.
These bases are awesome, but I do have one complaint. None of them are equatorial. I would love to launch from other sites, but I can't afford the plane change to rendezvous with my space station.

KSC 2 (which is the Baikonur analogue in the fandom, I think? Baikonur isn't equatorial either (and neither is the main NASA one. I'm an idiot...)), Mt. Snowey and Caldera are close enough, from the map.

But since more bases are planned on the other continent, we might get one there.

Edited June 30, 2014 by Melfice

So looking at this mod and liking it, I have one question.

Does it require Kerbtown? Wasn't exactly sure in the OP.

So looking at this mod and liking it, I have one question.

Does it require Kerbtown? Wasn't exactly sure in the OP.

Kerbtown is already included in the download.

If you're thinking of Kerbin City(Great Kerbtown addition, but horrid name as it's easy to confuse the two.), No it doesn't.
I have only one question as well: When does the train leave?

Kerbtown is already included in the download.

If you're thinking of Kerbin City(Great Kerbtown addition, but horrid name as it's easy to confuse the two.), No it doesn't.

Great, I know what I am adding to my stock sized Kerbin install.

I have only one question as well: When does the train leave?

Lack has the timetable.

EDIT - Forgot the droll smiley
Does the train go anywhere? How do I board it?

Does the train go anywhere? How do I board it?
You can't board it and it goes to nonexistenceland. However, it leaves somewhere around noon! I think.
Do you have any way to make the different bases open up as you progress the tech tree? In order of difficulty.
Only one annoyance I have with all this: that horridly over-sized button in the VAB/SPH for choosing a launch site. I'd be nice if we could banish that to a toolbar position instead.
I'll banish you to a toolbar position. Your button reads "overly sensitive to button size", and it's so tiny that if someone tried to click it they would have to get a 10000x8000 monitor.
This is the best mod Iv'e seen come out in weeks! Gonna try it for sure, but not until the dust settles.

I think it would be cool if you could start with just KSC but then you'd have a gigantahuge part that you could send on a monunormous rocket to any landmass on any planet and it would build a space center there.

I think it would be cool if you could start with just KSC but then you'd have a gigantahuge part that you could send on a monunormous rocket to any landmass on any planet and it would build a space center there.

I wish. For now we'll just have to pretend we sent a base with that huge rocket and use lack's waypoint base thing.
Congrats on being featured!

I Made A Short Mod Spotlight

Very Decent Mod Its Probably One Of My Favorites And Most Useful Mods.Thank You For Making This!
